trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.

When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>이벤트 처리기에 지정한 도구 설명 텍스트가 표시 됩니다 때마다는 마우스 포인터가 셀과 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>속성 값은 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>이벤트는 현재 상태 또는 셀의 값에 의해 결정 되는 도구 설명 표시 하려는 경우에 유용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>이벤트는 또한 될 때마다 발생의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>검색 하거나 프로그래밍 방식으로 또는 마우스 포인터가 셀 내부로 이동할 때.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>상태 또는 셀의 값을 확인 하 고이 정보를 사용 하 여 설정할 속성을는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 셀의 값으로 초기화 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>이벤트 값을 무시 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>많은 양의 데이터로 작업할 때 이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>여러 셀에 대 한 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값을 처음에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>셀에 설정 된 경우 속성을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
